languages.text: {n}Голос дознавателя становится сухим.{/n} "Лексмеханик мог быть свидетелем разговоров, которые представляют важное значение для расследования культа. Нам необходимо содержимое этого когитатора".

traits.locale_text: {n}Голос дознавателя становится сухим.{/n} "Лексмеханик мог быть свидетелем разговоров, которые представляют важное значение для расследования Культа Последнего восхода. Нам необходимо содержимое этого когитатора".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix's voice turns dry.{/n} "The Lexmechanic could have been privy to conversations that are vital to investigating the cult. We need the contents of that cogitator."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос дознавателя становится сухим.{/n} "Лексмеханик мог быть свидетелем разговоров, которые представляют важное значение для расследования культа. Нам необходимо содержимое этого когитатора".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's voice turns dry.{/n} "The lexmechanic could have been privy to conversations that are vital to investigating the Cult. We need the contents of that cogitator."
{n}Heinrix's voice turns dry.{/n} "The lexmechanic could have been privy to conversations that are vital to investigating the Cult. We need the contents of that cogitator."
{n}Heinrix's voice turns dry.{/n} "The lexmechanic could have been privy to conversations that are vital to investigating the Cult. We need the contents of that cogitator."
{n}Heinrix's voice turns dry.{/n} "The Lexmechanic could have been privy to conversations that are vital to investigating the Cult. We need the contents of that cogitator."

languages.text: {n}海因里希的声音变得冷漠。{/n}“或许这个思律机僧身上有着至关重要的线索，我们需要那个沉思者里的资料。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's voice turns dry.{/n} "The Lexmechanic could have been privy to conversations that are vital to investigating the cult. We need the contents of that cogitator."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希的声音变得冷漠。{/n}“或许这个法律技工身上有着至关重要的线索，我们需要那个思考器里的资料。”

languages.text: {n}La voz de Heinrix es seca.{/n} «El lexmecánico podría haber sido testigo de conversaciones esenciales para mi investigación del Culto. Necesitamos el contenido de ese cogitador».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's voice turns dry.{/n} "The Lexmechanic could have been privy to conversations that are vital to investigating the cult. We need the contents of that cogitator."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de Heinrix es seca.{/n} «El lexmecánico podría haber sido testigo de conversaciones esenciales para mi investigación del Culto. Necesitamos el contenido de ese cogitador».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスの声が乾いたものに変わる。{/n}「法技術者は、教団の調査に不可欠な会話を知っている可能性があります。考算機の中身が必要です」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's voice turns dry.{/n} "The Lexmechanic could have been privy to conversations that are vital to investigating the cult. We need the contents of that cogitator."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスの声が乾いたものに変わる。{/n}「法技術者は、教団の調査に不可欠な会話を知っている可能性があります。考算機の中身が必要です」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix' Stimme wird nüchtern.{/n} "Der Lexmechanicus könnte Gespräche mitgehört haben, die für die Untersuchung des Kults entscheidend sind. Wir brauchen den Inhalt dieses Cogitators."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's voice turns dry.{/n} "The Lexmechanic could have been privy to conversations that are vital to investigating the cult. We need the contents of that cogitator."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix' Stimme wird nüchtern.{/n} "Der Lexmechanicus könnte Gespräche mitgehört haben, die für die Untersuchung des Kults entscheidend sind. Wir brauchen den Inhalt dieses Cogitators."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix continue sur un ton sec.{/n} « Il est possible que ce lexmécanicien ait entendu des conversations qui se révéleront capitales dans mon enquête sur le Culte. Nous avons besoin du contenu de ce cogitateur. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's voice turns dry.{/n} "The Lexmechanic could have been privy to conversations that are vital to investigating the cult. We need the contents of that cogitator."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix continue sur un ton sec.{/n} « Il est possible que ce lexmécanicien ait entendu des conversations qui se révéleront capitales dans mon enquête sur le Culte. Nous avons besoin du contenu de ce cogitateur. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in sesi, kuru bir hâl alıyor.{/n} "Lexmekanik, tarikata yönelik soruşturma için önemli konuşmalara tanık olmuş olabilir. O kavramsayarın içerikleri bize lazım."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's voice turns dry.{/n} "The Lexmechanic could have been privy to conversations that are vital to investigating the cult. We need the contents of that cogitator."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix'in sesi, kuru bir hâl alıyor.{/n} "Lexmekanik, tarikata yönelik soruşturma için önemli konuşmalara tanık olmuş olabilir. O kavramsayarın içerikleri bize lazım."
